metadata.title: CVE-2024-22705 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ksmbd in the Linux kernel before 6.6.10.smb2_get_data_area_len in fs/smb/server/smb2misc.c can cause ansmb_strndup_from_utf16 out-of-bounds access because the relationshipbetween Name data and CreateContexts data is mishandled.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
